about_the_game: The demo has a limited build area and a limited set of nodes to play with. You can save any mixes you create, but you cannot edit them when you load them up later to listen to them. These mixes transfer over to the full game and can be edited in the full game once purchased.
detailed_description: The demo has a limited build area and a limited set of nodes to play with. You can save any mixes you create, but you cannot edit them when you load them up later to listen to them. These mixes transfer over to the full game and can be edited in the full game once purchased.
name: Mix Universe Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The demo has a limited build area and a limited set of nodes to play with. You can save any mixes you create, but you cannot edit them when you load them up later to listen to them. These mixes transfer over to the full game and can be edited in the full game once purchased.
